summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3685 , for the improvement of Brandon Street from Renton Avenue to Empire Way; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 45427 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
